gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 117, 76ers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the 76ers, 117-107. Jayson Tatum recorded a team high 29 points, along with eight rebounds and six assists for the Celtics, with Derrick White adding 27 points, five assists, and three rebounds in the victory. Joel Embiid tallied 20 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists for the 76ers in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 9-3 on the season, while the 76ers fall to 8-3.
